description:
In this episode, see high school boys deal with their sibling dating their friend`s sibling, visit their grandmother, break a younger girl`s heart, lose their glasses, solve issues with the student council, prove points, and atone for misdeeds.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Danshi Koukousei to Ani to Ane / Danshi Koukousei to Drop-Kicks / Danshi Koukousei to Natsu no Owari / Danshi Koukousei to Megane / Danshi Koukousei to Seito-kai no Nichijou / Danshi Koukousei to Pantsu / Danshi Koukousei to Haisen / Joshikousei wa Ijou "Arch Demon"

High School Boys and Siblings / High School Boys and Drop Kicks / High School Boys and the End of Summer / High School Boys and Glasses / High School Boys and the Daily Lives of Student Council Members / High School Boys and Panties / High School Boys and Wiring / High School Girls Are Funky: Arch Demon
男子高校生と兄と姉 / 男子高校生とドロップキック / 男子高校生と夏の終わり / 男子高校生とメガネ / 男子高校生と生徒会の日常 / 男子高校生とパンツ / 男子高校生と配線 / 女子高生は異常「アークデーモン」
